title: File Manager For Dropbox
description:
Manage and display Dropbox files on your WordPress site! Integrate Dropbox plugin for WordPress offers seamless file management making it perfect for WordPress users.



✨Key Features
User-Specific Folders: Set up folders specific to individual users
Auto Sync/Update: Automatically (1-3 mins) sync and update new images to web pages
Media Library Integration: Seamlessly integrates with WordPress media library.
Classic, Elementor  & Gutenberg Editor Support.
WooCommerce Support.
LMS Integration.
